name: Protein Smoothie
description: High-protein post-workout drink for muscle recovery. Filling and delicious.

instructions.instruction: Add liquids to blender base first - almond milk and yogurt.
Break banana into pieces and add.
instructions.tip: Frozen banana makes shake cold and creamy.
Peanut butter adds healthy fats and extra protein.

instructions.instruction: Blend on high 1-2 minutes until completely smooth.
instructions.tip: No oat particles should remain - blend longer.

instructions.instruction: Pour into shaker or glass and drink immediately.
instructions.tip: Ideal to consume within 30 minutes post-workout.

tips: Post-workout protein intake is critical for muscle repair and growth.
Adjust liquid based on your protein powder brand.
Banana provides complex carbs and potassium.
storageInfo: Drink immediately - not recommended to store.
servingSuggestion: Drink within 30-60 minutes after workout. Carry in shaker or sport bottle.
variations: Chocolate: Chocolate protein powder + 1 tbsp cocoa.
Coffee: Add 1 shot espresso or 1 tsp coffee powder.
Berry: Use mixed berries instead of banana.
Green: Add 1 handful spinach - taste unchanged.
